 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִקָּלֹן‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** doubtful word; — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצִקְנֹוֺ כַרְמֶל‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.42|2Kgs 4:42]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***garment***; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] omitted, but [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">βακελλεθ,</span> Arm. ***bakela*** <span class="bdbLangGreek">θ</span> whence [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Armen. Stud. § 333, M. i. 212</sup> reads (plausibly) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּקְלַעְתּוֺ‎</span> ***in his wallet***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and so [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***pera.*** I, II, III, IV. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַר‎</span>, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹר‎</span>, see I, II, III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צרר‎</span>.
